name: mattman
cooked: I don’t think it’s worth the effort. I doubt anybody is going to be searching for any random open source hardware project. People are going to search for an interesting project and then, in that project, they’ll check to see if it’s open source (if they even care).
raw: I don't think it's worth the effort. I doubt anybody is going to be searching for any random open source hardware project. People are going to search for an interesting project and then, in that project, they'll check to see if it's open source (if they even care).
